mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_article (articleNo, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt) VALUES (#{articleNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{regDate}, #{viewCnt})
mapper.select: SELECT articleNo, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt FROM tb_article WHERE articleNo > 0 ORDER BY articleNo DESC, regDate DESC
SELECT articleNo, title, content, writer, regDate, viewCnt FROM tb_article WHERE articleNo > 0 ORDER BY articleNo DESC, regDate DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT COUNT(articleNo) FROM tb_article WHERE articleNo > 0
